snippet.title: The Medium - Behind The Scenes
snippet.description:
There's the spirit world hiding behind the physical dimensions, and there are amazing people behind the development of The Medium. People who made Marianne's story their passion. Welcome to the first episode of the Behind the Scenes series for Bloobber Team's biggest project to date.

Discover a dark mystery only a medium can solve. Explore the real world and the spirit world at the same time. Use your psychic abilities to solve puzzles spanning both worlds, uncover deeply disturbing secrets, and survive encounters with The Maw - a monster born from an unspeakable tragedy.

Coming Holiday 2020 to PC & Xbox Series X and available now for pre-order!

- https://bit.ly/SteamMedium 
- https://bit.ly/MSstoreMedium

Official page: https://www.themediumgame.com 
FB: https://www.facebook.com/MediumGame/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheMediumGame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/the_medium_... 

#TheMediumGame #BlooberTeam #BehindTheScenes
